comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.google.com/search?q=inurl%3Ab.hatena.ne.jp%2Fentry](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dinurl%253Ab.hatena.ne.jp%252Fentry) ### Comment > #147257 > I can reproduce this issue as well. I suspect it is caused by the following rule. > ~hatena.ne.jp##a[href*="//b.hatena.ne.jp/entry/"] > Actually b.hatena.ne.jp/entry/ is a URL used for some web content in Japan, so I don't think it is appropriate to remove it from search results. > I suggest modifying this rule as follows. > ~hatena.ne.jp,~google.com,~google.co.jp,~search.yahoo.co.jp,~bing.com,~duckduckgo.com##a[href*="//b.hatena.ne.jp/entry/"] ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/cVYUQ03.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/jDvWxS7.png)

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/144595#issuecomment-1501080628

---

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
It seems that it's caused by `Fanboy's Annoyances` filter, but it's related to this issue - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/ExtendedCss/issues/166
Please add this rule:
```adblock
aamulehti.fi,hs.fi,is.fi,jamsanseutu.fi,janakkalansanomat.fi,kankaanpaanseutu.fi,kmvlehti.fi,merikarvialehti.fi,nokianuutiset.fi,rannikkoseutu.fi,satakunnankansa.fi,suurkeuruu.fi,sydansatakunta.fi,tyrvaansanomat.fi,valkeakoskensanomat.fi#@#body:not(:-abp-has(.embed-cookie-consent-icon)) > div[id^="sp_message_container"]
```
to user rules.

comment.body:
I guess this `Hide my Email` option requires iCloud+, which I don't have.
Btw, I don't see the rules that can break this window on icloud.com.
Please check the site only with AdGuard filters by leaving only the list below.
Note that you should wait in the extension ~ a minute and after that restart Safari, open the site.

```
AdGuard Base
AdGuard Tracking Protection
AdGuard Social Media
AdGuard Annoyances
```

Next time you should report in their repo, but I'll tell the author about it.
You can turn the filter off until it's fixed.

Fix #148005 contents.fc2.com

To reproduce, you need to add japanese language to your browser locale.

Если вы используете AdGuard Browser Extension, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

comment.body:
> @Yuki2718 Hello! Should we exclude search websites from this rules? [#147257 (comment)](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/147257#issuecomment-1504509506)
> 
> ```
> ~hatena.ne.jp##a[href*="//b.hatena.ne.jp/add?"]
> ~hatena.ne.jp##a[href*="//b.hatena.ne.jp/append?"]
> ~hatena.ne.jp##a[href*="//b.hatena.ne.jp/entry/"]
> ```

Looks to be a bug, `@@||www.google.*/search?$generichide` in EL/Base is not working. @ameshkov

comment.body: Advanced Protection is turned on with Premium. Still has this.

Yes. Of note you see different self-promo banner on (nsfw) `https://adult.contents.fc2.com/`, but using full URL won't be wise as this is a very temporal campaign. We can go with `||static.fc2.com/contents/images/ZQEJVWJ2Z/j4k/` as it has been stable for years, though it may possibly cause false positive. Or we can just ignore this.

comment.body:
Current elements are blocked via generic rules.

Maybe we could add this rule as generic:

`##.share-tools-v2`

But then the button to copy the url is also hidden (imho useless, everybody can just click in address bar and then hit copy).
